featured.text: In what order did the following protective hats appear? a. fiberglass hats b. hats with see-through shields c. hats with canvas and leather d. hats with tar over them (A)

definition.zh_def: 帽子，一種用來覆蓋頭部的服裝，通常用於保護或裝飾。
definition.en_def: Hats are articles of clothing worn on the head, often for protection or decoration.
definition.example: She wore a stylish hat to the summer picnic.
